definition: lit. imperial funding for troops/funds or items supplied by the government
lit. to eat from government coffers/to serve as a government employee/to live off government money

sentences.english: Each government worker is accountable for his own work.
sentences.chinese: 人們稱政府官員是喫皇糧的工作人員。

sentences.english: Government officials are called working staff paid by the imperial court.
sentences.chinese: 人們稱政府官員是喫皇糧的工作人員。
